context.p: CCoeAppUi provides APIs for view deregistration and pseudo-view deregistration.
context.note: Application must remove the views from the app UIâ€™s control stack before deregistering the view.
context.p: There are different variants to deregister a view. See CCoeAppUi::DeregisterView() for details.
The following code snippet shows removing a view from the control stack and deregistering it.
